FuncDef: The display traffic-analysis udp cache command displays detailed information about intelligent traffic analysis results for UDP flows. The display traffic-analysis udp cache command displays detailed information about intelligent traffic analysis results for UDP flows. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE6885-LL (low latency mode), CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
CLIs: display traffic-analysis udp cache [ source-ip <source-ip-address> | destination-ip <destination-ip-address> | vni <vniid> | interface { <iftype> <interface-number> | <ifname> } ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the source IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the destination IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a VXLAN network identifier (VNI).
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16777215.

Specifies the interface index.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the ID of a device.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.
